node.title: Ally Kostial murder: Inside her college life & evidence in the case
node.description: Ally Kostial loved attending the University of Mississippi. Her life was cut short on July 20, 2019, when she was shot dead by a fellow student at a desolate fishing camp about 30 miles from campus.
node.content: ["Alexandria \"Ally\" Kostial, a St. Louis, Missouri, native, dreamed of attending the University of Mississippi. The 21-year-old was studying marketing and hoped to work in the fashion industry after graduation.", "It's where she made many friends, taught fitness classes and was part of the golf club. Her life was cut short on July 20, 2019, when a fellow University of Mississippi student shot her dead at a desolate fishing camp about 30 miles from campus.\u00a0"]
